snippet.title: Bloodrush: Undying Wish - Gameplay Presentation
snippet.description:
#bloodrush #hacknslash #roguelike  #indiegame #actiongames 

Bloodrush: Undying Wish 

Gameplay video for our upcoming hack n' slash game, Bloodrush. In this game, the player is encouraged to aggressively use its combat abilities to evade, control and destroy their opponents, moving around in a deadly dance of carnage. Focused on movement abilities, split-second decision-making and stylish strings of attacks, the game is heavily inspired by titles such as Devil May Cry, Akane, Hyper Light Drifter, Hades and Ultrakill.

Follow us for future updates:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lightmancer... Twitter: https://twitter.com/LightmancerDev
Linktree: https://linktr.ee/lightmancerstudios
